data.name: VEGA Conflict - Corinthian Pack (Discounted)
data.detailed_description:
Step up your gameplay now with the Corinthian Pack! It contains:

Corinthian Cruiser (x5) - Tear through your opponents with this lethal combat hull.

5000 Coins - Providing you with the ability to build upon your base assets with the latest tech and resources. Bonus Coins will really help you make your mark in the sector.

Bonus consumable equipment credits to craft your epic Corinthian Cruisers:

- Gatling Ray II (x20)
- Blast Shield III (x10)
- Fusion Thrusters III (x5)
- Ionized Optics III (x5)
- Zynthium IV (x20)
data.about_the_game:
Step up your gameplay now with the Corinthian Pack! It contains:

Corinthian Cruiser (x5) - Tear through your opponents with this lethal combat hull.

5000 Coins - Providing you with the ability to build upon your base assets with the latest tech and resources. Bonus Coins will really help you make your mark in the sector.

Bonus consumable equipment credits to craft your epic Corinthian Cruisers:

- Gatling Ray II (x20)
- Blast Shield III (x10)
- Fusion Thrusters III (x5)
- Ionized Optics III (x5)
- Zynthium IV (x20)
data.short_description: Get the Corinthian Pack now and equip your fleet with the Corinthian Cruiser. This Cruiser will instantly give you the destruction results you want!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese-Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with OS

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with OS
